ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service
Class MicroGesture

java.lang.Object
  ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.service.MicroGesture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class MicroGesture
extends Object
implements Cloneable

Represents a MicroGesture, a minimal gesture in which we want separate our input point. Implements Parcelable and can therefore be send to and from a service.

Author:
Julian Hanhart, Dominik Giger
